resources.string: Take screenshots from your Quick Settings tile or notification panel

1. Tap "Enable Screenshot Service" below to grant permission once.

2. Swipe down from the top of your screen to open the Quick Settings panel.

3. Tap the pencil/edit icon to add tiles, find "Screenshot" and drag it in.

4. Now just tap the Screenshot tile anytime â€” no permission prompt needed!
